website_summaries.verdict: The best and among the most versatile BMX tires available.
pros: Comes in several different sizes to fit different rim diameters and widths
Features a more pronounced tread pattern that balances some decent off-road traction with less rolling resistance on paved surfaces for extra speed
cons: Can feel oversized on certain BMX rims

customer_reviews.title: Great for peg perego 12v JohnDeere tractor
customer_reviews.text: I cut the sidewalls out of these and used them as traction strips on the back tires of a little peg perego 12v JohnDeere tractor. Worked awesome! It tanks though the grass and mud and up hills like nothing now. ( note : these did not fit over the larger tires on our peg perego 12v rzr 900, I think you need 14 in ones for the larger tires)
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to replace
customer_reviews.text: After 3 inner tube replacement, I found a hold on the tire that causes the content puncture of the inner tube. Order the tire, it arrived and replace it in 10 minutes. The kid is happy again. Some might argue to purchase a $9 tire for a $40 bike. However, a happy kid that can ride her bicycle around the block again worth the money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Wong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: It's not easy to install new tires on bikes as it is even for cyclists. I am also pretty skilled having done it a few times but I'm only knocking off 1 start because these were particularly harder and unless you already have the tire tools and some strength as well as some patience I can't give them a perfect 5 of 5. Regardless, the tires themselves are exactly what I needed and they seem to wear just fine.
customer_reviews.author: KCMoSoxFan

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Great customer service !
customer_reviews.text: First of all the tires are great. Easy to install and very aggressive. My kid loves them. Second. My first shipment was lost. I was not happy. However Shane at planet Cyclery was very responsive when I messaged him and sent a replacement package that arrived fast. Then the next day after it arrived, the lost shipment arrived(figures). The process took longer than I planned but the feedback is good because they took care of it as best as they could.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Installed the tire but was out of round and would not fit/seal. The inner tube slides out of the wheel and cannot be kept inside the tire. Product is china crap.
customer_reviews.author: Chucho

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money without breaking the bank .
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money . I use sunlite tire at my job . I maintain a fleet of three wheeled bikes . That are ridden by adults in our factory. After all the abuse we put our sunlite tires through. This brand holds up very well to our abuse . Very happy with there products for the last 20 years or so ..
customer_reviews.author: Road Matthews

customer_reviews.title: They're tires.  Good tires.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to restore my old Variflex Freestyle scooter (from the late 1980's). Tires have so far worked just fine; no complaints on quality. Not sure what the weight limit is on these, but at 190lbs I'm able to ride the scooter a few laps around the cul-de-sac without too much compression on the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a non conventional use. I cut the beads off and screwed the tread on to my kids powerwheels plastic wheels so I don't have to push them all of the time. The tires are great, never get stuck or spin out anymore. The rubber is tough enough to screw it to the plastic wheels and has stayed on without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dp

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I actually drilled these so I could attach them to a homemade movable shelf. They worked great ! They glide so smoothly. I was impressed by how heavy duty they are. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate1

customer_reviews.title: however once the tires were fitted they look really nice. The tires are soft to the touch
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize how hard it would be to put on such small tires, I am used to working with 26" tires and am used to them going on without putting up a fight. It took two people to get the original tires off the bike (also hard) and two people to put the new tires on. however once the tires were fitted they look really nice. The tires are soft to the touch, and fit the bike. They are a nice clean white color, i am sure my daughter will love these.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle M

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: ordered two. Came all folded up and were difficult to install and form to the rim. After a month, one is discolored to Nasty yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Wieser

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price NOT high quality very basic mid quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these tires and for the price I was happy this is not a top of the line tire its mid quality like what you would see at walmart etc! Its perfect for a play bike thats just being ridden normal and it does what its intended to do. Perfect for a young childs bike or someone that is not going to be riding hard! If you ride hard, race, jump etc then I would look elsewhere as this is not what I would consider a quality tire just a basic tire for basic riding!
customer_reviews.author: spydy

customer_reviews.title: It had been passed down and she was like the 5th kid to use it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Wasn't able to find these little tires for my daughter's little bike. It had been passed down and she was like the 5th kid to use it, original tires really bald. These went on as expected. Good quality. I think she'll be ready for training wheels to come off any day now.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a child's bicycle
customer_reviews.text: This is a tire for kid bicycle, it's not like a kid will do 100 mile cross country race or ride downhill park so any tire should work as long as it's the right size and without manufacturing defects. This tire satisfies both criteria so giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: dmk

customer_reviews.title: don't buy bike tires online
customer_reviews.text: waaaay to small???? how hard is this 🤦🏼 Don't buy bike tires online. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: ursula h

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for a little kids bike. Lots of deep tread and seem to be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: gmtk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a child's bicycle tire replacement
customer_reviews.text: These tires are perfect for a child's bicycle tire replacement for 20" bicycles. The tires on our daughter's bicycle were pretty worn, and were also black (to which our daughter expressed her dislike). These tires were economical,, they fit perfectly with no tightness/looseness issues, and they are white- our daughter loved the new tires on her bicycle and is happily riding away on them- they seem to roll perfectly for her, and have enough tread so she can go anywhere she wants.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Brunkel

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Great fit to fix up old training bike for second child without having to buy a whole new bike.
customer_reviews.author: HealingArtsMaq

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: looks great and a perfect fit to replace old tires on a scooter
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality replacement, low price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement tire for my daughter's bike. Was very surprised at the lack of options in my area and online. But, found this product and was exactly what I needed, it's been over 6 months and have had no issues. Would definitely recommend to anyone who needs to replace a bike tire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 12.5" wheel on a child's bike
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 12.5" wheel on a child's bike. Good rubber compound.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony V. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tires with a decent amount (thickness) of tread. Perfect replacement for a small child's bike, to pass on to a new child, and a much better value than buying a new bike.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Works great, was a much tighter fit than the it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, was a much tighter fit than the it replaced. Made it harder to get on, but worked great after that.
customer_reviews.author: extraerrand

customer_reviews.title: The tires are very cheap quality. After only a ...
customer_reviews.text: The tires are very cheap quality. After only a few days of use by my 3 year old, they are bald. I am shocked that they didn't even hold up through one of my 3 kids. I was hoping they would last for the next one to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Welch

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement for a worn out tire
customer_reviews.text: This tire is well made. My daughters bike still has training wheels and she worn down the tread due to the training wheels being set a little too low. Her spin outs on uneven surfaces eventually worn down the tire tread. This tire was an exact match to the one on her bike. She was thrilled to have her bike back in like new condition with no more spin outs. And yes, I did adjust the training wheels so it will not spin out anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It's a fuctional tire
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I would prefer a more street friendly tread design (these are pure off-road knobby), but it hardly matters on a 12-inch push bicycle. Note, I was replacing a tire on a Kinderbike Laufrad, and the original tires were labeled "12 x 2.125". Turns out they were mislabeled, and were actually 12.5-inch, which is often referred to as 12-inch.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stilwell

customer_reviews.title: No issues here
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product. Easy to install. A few months later and still no problems
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hamra

customer_reviews.title: Another Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this tire for my daughter's cute little bike. The bike is in OK condition but it severely needed a rear tire. This was an exact match! It fits perfectly and makes her bike look so much better and new. Nice tread - will buy again for the front tire.
customer_reviews.author: GuitarGuy310

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tire I used mine on a big wheel toddler tricycle, whereas you cut the tire and take out an inch or so, then screw it into the sides of the big wheel -- to give it actual grip
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Dibble

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tires; Good price
customer_reviews.text: 14 inch tires are a bit uncommon, so I was glad I found these. The local shop had the 14 inch one's for almost double the price but they would install for free. The tires are good quality and actually seemed better than the previous one's I replaced (comparing sides of the tires). I also ordered Sunlite tube separately for my daughter's 24" bike which was also slightly better quality than the tube it replaced. Good overall experience.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kid bikes
customer_reviews.text: These tires are a great deal for the money. All of the tires I have seen for child-size bikes are imported, and these are of the same quality as all the rest at a lower price than local retailers. The seller I dealt shipped promptly and communicated the order well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hutfless

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement tire
customer_reviews.text: Nice low cost replacement tire for my kids bike. Seem to be a bit big but I had to adjust it a few time so it fit without being lopsided on the rim. so far so good, hope it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Cam Neil

customer_reviews.title: They went on the smaller front wheels easy. The 14 inch rear wheels took a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how these work on a bike. I bought these to put on my grandsons power wheel atv. They are now traction strips on the plastic wheels. I got tired of having to give him a push every time he got stuck so I cut off the side walls and stretched them onto the wheels. They went on the smaller front wheels easy. The 14 inch rear wheels took a bit more effort. He doesn't get stuck anymore. Check out the videos on Utube. That's what I did.
customer_reviews.author: maytrix

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement! Be sure to also have 12.5" tube if needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great tire! Perfect replacement for a child's bike. Changing the tire is a very simple task with just a few tools needed. Be sure to verify size on the side of the tire and also have a 12.5" tube to go inside of it. The tubes are about $3 at wally world. Amazon is the cheapest place I could find the tire.
customer_reviews.author: Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Did it’s job, the bike is back on the road 😋
customer_reviews.author: JMarti

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 25 year old scooter exactly like the OEM tires
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 25 year old scooter exactly like the OEM tires... After sitting in my parents garage for 20 years, the old tires were literally turning to dust. These were easy to go on, and ride just like I remember.
customer_reviews.author: dmz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my grandson's bike. He skids on his tires and didn't want to spend a lot on fixing a used bike. Great quality for price. Grandson is back on the road again. Delivered on time and exactly what we ordered and needed. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: B. Adleman

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Cart replacement tires!
customer_reviews.text: Used as replacement tires for my Sun Mountain golf cart. These roll much easier than the Foam Tires.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire for my kids bike
customer_reviews.text: Nice tire seems like it will last easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, thick, and strong sidewalk. Good tire, and if my daughters other tire blows, I’ll be buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lintz

customer_reviews.title: Tire
customer_reviews.text: Worked as intended. My daughter now has her favorite bike again
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the wheel of my 5 year old daughter 's bike flat tire. I tried to replace it for the first time. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Youngsu Ryu

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great product exactly what i was looking for thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonis#1

customer_reviews.title: The wheels on the bike go round and round
customer_reviews.text: Helped my son rebuild his bike this summer and these tires are well worth the money and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: They do not fit... took them to ...
customer_reviews.text: They do not fit...took them to a bike shop and he couldn't mount them either. The tire says 20 inch. ..it's well under 20 and won't mount
customer_reviews.author: yo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! It fit our little girls bike just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! It fit our little girls bike just perfect. We didn't want to pay a fortune to fix it when we knew it wouldn't last long (because she likes to go fast and skid to a stop) so this item was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: napiermom

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of them to replace both tires on my son's bike. They just fit perfectly. Make sure to look the spec on the old tire before placing the order so that you will get the right one. Note that, although the title says Sunlite (not sure it's the brand name of tire or some distributor's name), the actual brand on the tire is Kenda.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: great tire!
customer_reviews.text: So we used this to add some more traction to the back tires ofmy 5 year old has. For that purpose it worked really well. I can only assume for bicycles that it would work even better! Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: hiowatha

customer_reviews.title: Work great, no issues
customer_reviews.text: Replacement tires for my Jeep jogging stroller. Work great, no issues!
customer_reviews.author: G.D.

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement for worn out original equipment tire.
customer_reviews.text: My son wore out his original tire in 2 months making skid marks. This tire has the same tread pattern as the one that came with the bike. I hope it will last longer than the one that came with the bike. Fit perfect and installed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Todd in AZ

customer_reviews.title: They are okay.
customer_reviews.text: The tires are nice and work excellent on the bike. However they are made with a series of substances that could cause cancer. So try to keep them away from the kids and animals until you can get them on the bike. I tried to handle them as little as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: So hard to find locally, thank goodness for Amazon Sellers!
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned by others, it's next to impossible to find this size tire in a local store. Found it on here and ordered it right away because my daughter was sad that she couldn't ride her bike! It came when expected and I installed within minutes (i've changed many tires). Will definitely come back here if and when the other tire wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Al Mars

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for kids bike
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my 4 yr old sons bike and it is very high quality for the price. It was delivered way before the amazon estimated date of arrival. I am an an avid cyclist and I will try to buy my tires from this company in the future to avoid the lbs prices! At first I bought the wrong width and their customer service was very very good and kind, that is a huge bonus these days, and I was able to exchange for the right size immediately with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: fixed my daughter's bike. too expensive though. half ...
customer_reviews.text: fixed my daughter's bike. too expensive though. half of the price of a new bike...she loves her bike and I have no choice
customer_reviews.author: cold fire

customer_reviews.title: Fit our daughters bike perfectly. 2nd purchase. Now ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit our daughters bike perfectly. 2nd purchase. Now if only I can teach her to stop skidding her tires so I don't have to keep replacing them.
customer_reviews.author: Al Gunn

customer_reviews.title: product arrived as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good way to restore my kids old bikes. Tires appear to be as good or better than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a champ, easy to install and now my daughter's bike looks like new again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L.

customer_reviews.title: Bad mail out
customer_reviews.text: Was glade they finely came our granddaughter was very upset waiting for them
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to replace the tires on my dog stroller
customer_reviews.author: Ravensman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Not available in local stores, so this worked out perfectly. Tire was an exact match and installed without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mughal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bike tire.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bike tire. My son put a hole in his tire after stopping in the same spot all the time. This tire has held up nicely and easy to put on his bike.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great as traction bands for ride on toys
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 12.5 tire to put on a peg perego razr ride on for my daughter. Had a hard time getting them on, but they do fit and stay in place perfectly. Definitely adds traction to the plastic wheels.
customer_reviews.author: dgurn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kids 16" Bike
customer_reviews.text: Was trying to find these locally but it seems everyone sells the bikes, just not replacement tires. They arrived quickly and packed very well. The tires themselves seem much better quality then what was on the bike. Will definitely purchase these again if we go through this set.
customer_reviews.author: MK.ca

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price but took way to long to be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I already got 4 of these because they are perfect to add a traction strip to the plastic wheels ...
customer_reviews.text: I already got 4 of these because they are perfect to add a traction strip to the plastic wheels of a beatle powerwheels car. It's a very tight fit for the powerwheels but that is just perfect for it.
customer_reviews.author: CYBORGX

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did a good job replacing the factory supplied tire. Looks good and appears to be wearing well
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good match for Disney Princess bike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had the Disney Princess bike and the back tire was bald and needed replacing. This was a perfect fit and match to color.
customer_reviews.author: Jean9

customer_reviews.title: Need modification to resist goatheads
customer_reviews.text: Goathead thorns will go into it with ease. The remedy is to cut some older and smaller size tires insert inside it to double the thickness ! Then goathead thorns gave up!
customer_reviews.author: L. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for a hard to find tire size
customer_reviews.text: This tire worked great for our sons bike which actually called for a 14x1.95 size which is not to be found except for companies located in China. Shipping was quick and I received it within a week of ordering. No complaints with the product or the company that purchased from.
customer_reviews.author: hmc

customer_reviews.title: Used Bike; New Tires
customer_reviews.text: My daughter inherited her first "big girl" bike from a friend, and it was in need of new tires. These were very easy to install. The bike has been ridden extensively on streets and sidewalks for about a year now, and the tires seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M.

customer_reviews.title: I bought the 16" black tires for my sons bike ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 16" black tires for my sons bike (an Avigo Rattle Snake). They fit perfectly, I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MayDayJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires
customer_reviews.text: Tires are well made. Installed easily and look great. Can's speak to durability but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: 20" Cyco Cycle Rear Tire Substitute
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement rear tires for the Cyco Cycle because the original size is not available.
customer_reviews.author: E Ragland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Price and met my needs for repairing a bike for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Boyd Rush

customer_reviews.title: The size was correct.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on an adult tricycle that I am refurbishing. These tires worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: ss7957ss

customer_reviews.title: Works for my daughter's bike
customer_reviews.text: Used this to replace my daughter's rear tire after she wore the other one completely down to the tube. It's working fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: AKorf

customer_reviews.title: just what was needed for our bike
customer_reviews.text: My son's bike is an unusual size (14") that I was not able to find a replacement tire for locally. I was very grateful that I was able to get one here through Amazon. The tire is great quality and works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DotHansen

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: This was an odd size tire that I couldn't find anywhere in my area... I looked on Amazon and found it very quickly. The item arrived very fast, fits perfect & my daughter's bike is back in business! She's a happy camper and so is dad!
customer_reviews.author: TheDudeMan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price, quality tires. Just what we needed to fix up the old bike for the grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: V. Williams

customer_reviews.title: bike tires
customer_reviews.text: awesome product arrived fast and worked well with bike rims...looks like a new bike with new tires.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A Singleton

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This tire looks to be made very well and I installed it on my granddaughter' bike with no problems. It was just in time to see her learn to ride without training wheels---------everybody's happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: William Mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Nice and durable
customer_reviews.text: Held up on my medical scooter nicely on bike paths in Colorado.
customer_reviews.author: SirWyatt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this company, finally found a white tire for my daughter bicycle 😊
customer_reviews.author: Gisela Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Hard-to-find size
customer_reviews.text: This size tire is not available anywhere locally, and in white, not easy to find online. We purchased a vintage kick scooter at an estate sale for our 9 y/o grandson. It was in excellent shape, other than minor adjustment of the handbrakes and dry-rotted tires. He helped his Papa with the repairs and is now able to "scoot" down the sidewalk in grand style.
customer_reviews.author: stitchcat

customer_reviews.title: 18 x 1.75 misleading title
customer_reviews.text: These are 18 x 1.75" tires. The tubes are extremely tight in there as you can imagine. But our 8 year old likes them, so 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Put them on and they a perfect
customer_reviews.text: Surprised to see tires in a small box. Put them on and they a perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: just what my son wanted for his bike
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a white rear tire for his bike and we could not find one locally. His bike tires are also not a common size being a 14" bike so was great to be able to get it here!
customer_reviews.author: DotHansen

customer_reviews.title: She didn't want to put the black tire from Target on her pink bike for some reason...
customer_reviews.text: I think this is better quality than the OEM tire on my daughter's bike...looks good, fits and she's happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... on the bike in a few minutes and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Went right on the bike in a few minutes and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: suzie

customer_reviews.title: Fits Hotwheels Bikes!
customer_reviews.text: My child loves the white ;) This was the only tire we could find in this size! Glad it match his bike somewhat and that he was beyond excited for its arrival. Which was FAST!
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Came deformed in box. Mishapen and unbalanced. Would ...
customer_reviews.text: Came deformed in box. Mishapen and unbalanced. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take very long for this tire to wear out. It was even the front tire too!
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Neill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These tires came in great shape and work well on my daughter's bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Quality appears to be good as well
customer_reviews.text: Tires as expected. Quality appears to be good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Canova

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and able to hand down the bike to the next son.
customer_reviews.author: Dczek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a tire and it works/ Put it on a cart/
customer_reviews.author: frankish70

customer_reviews.title: Great Treads for Toddler Gator
customer_reviews.text: I read an article on Ebay where the guy cut the sidewalls off a bike tire and used the treads for traction on a child's battery powered vehicle. I tried it out and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron McLean

customer_reviews.title: Tires work great
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to find a white tire this size in the stores. They work great and my daughter is thrilled to have a bike that looks new with bright white tires!
customer_reviews.author: MElissa Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to change the tires of my 4yo daughter's "Hello kitty" bike from Toys R Us. They fit perfectly and are of better quality than the original tires.
customer_reviews.author: E.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Seems like a good tire for a good price
customer_reviews.author: David L

product_meta.title: SUNLITE MX3 BMX Tires
product_meta.description: Sunlite MX3 Tires in multiple colors and sizes
feature_bullets: Entry-level BMX tire with durable casing to prevent pinch flats.
